I get paid at the end of every month, but because of an unforseen emergency, I can't make ends meet till I get paid. What can I do?

One of the benefits we offer with our Everyday Banking Account, is the ability of constant salary earners to get up to a 50% advance, which can easily be paid back. You can easily create an Everyday Banking Account at any of our branches. A letter of introduction, staff ID, means of identification, and passport photograph, would be needed to create this account. If you already have an Everyday Banking Account, dail *901*11#, to have access to this service.

I am not sure how my account balance got like this, how do i check where my money has been going to

Sorry about that. You can check out your recent transactions by clicking the 'Transactions History' tab on the home page of your mobile app. This tab would give a vivid description of every transaction undergone within the last week. If you are looking for transactions older than a week, you would have to generate a bank statement. To do that, you would have to go to the menu page on your mobile app. Look for the 'Generate Statement' tab, click on it, and you would be prompted with an option to set the duration in which the statement should cover. You will also be prompted to provide your email address for the statement to be sent to when generated.

My ATM card got stolen and I need to block my ATM card as soon as possible, What do I do?

To get your ATM card blocked, the following details are needed
	Card number(the sixteen digits at the front of the card )
	Cardholder's name written at the front of the card
	Cvv digits(the three digits at the back of the card)

Is it possible to pay for things, like data and dstv, on my bank app

Yes you can! Our mobile banking application allows you to pay various bills from the comfort of your home. We support payment of; cable TV, data plans, utility bills, religious payment, school fees, insurance, and many more. Just head on to the homepage of your mobile app, click on the 'Bills' tab, and select the type of payment you want to make from the drop down menu.
